content: 2023 Singaporean television series ***All That Glitters*** ([Chinese](/wiki/Simplified_Chinese_characters): 金色大道; previously titled ***Road to Riches***) is a 2023 Singaporean drama series starring [Desmond Tan](/wiki/Desmond_Tan_(actor)), [Jeremy Chan](/wiki/Jeremy_Chan), [Ayden Sng](/wiki/Ayden_Sng), [Chantalle Ng](/wiki/Chantalle_Ng), [Hong Ling](/wiki/Hong_Ling_(actress)) and [He Ying Ying](/wiki/He_Ying_Ying). It airs every Monday to Friday, 9pm, on [Channel 8](/wiki/Channel_8_(Singaporean_TV_channel)) and [meWATCH](/wiki/MeWATCH) from 18 September 2023. ## Synopsis One day, a businessman is found murdered in a villa, with his valuables all missing. The businessman is Jianzhi and the police puts out an international wanted notice for suspects Musen and Jintiao. It turns out Jianzhi, Musen and Jintiao were good friends in the past. As the suspect duo begins their escape, the secrets of the trio are gradually uncovered. ## Cast - [Desmond Tan](/wiki/Desmond_Tan_(actor)) as Lin Musen (Liu Mu) - Alfred Ong as young Lin Musen (Liu Mu) -
